text: Army Public School is a higher-secondary co-education government school in the Patiala city of Punjab, India. The school was founded in 1985 and is affiliated to the Central Board of Secondary Education since 2013. == References == Category:Indian Army Public Schools Category:Co-educational schools in India Category:High schools and secondary schools in Patiala Category:High schools and secondary schools Category:Educational institutions established in 1985 Category:1985 establishments in India
title: Army Public School, Patiala
